Published November 2 2014

Practical knots for everyday uses

Practical knots for everyday uses — You may not be able to remember the last time you tied a knot that didn’t sit on your shoes, but that doesn’t matter. It’s worth your time to learn at least four out of the nine knots the author lists in this article. Then go learn how to make fire without matches. Seriously.

Enjoy your day.
